authors: Uriah Brown (PanoramicPanda), David Lee (camperdave), Corin Stratton (cwstra)
instructions: Pokemon Tabletop United Trainer/Pokemon Sheet Attack Buttons The Physical Attack button will roll damage and add the Combat Value of ATK to the roll. The Special Attack button does the same but for SPATK.  To save time, try enabling the macro bar in your settings, and then dragging down roll buttons to the macro bar. Alternatively, these macros might be helpful: [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1t35l_ky6oI3J4cslLQ5r96vSVdvx7am1qgqgf0auejc/edit?usp=sharing]  For help in creating your pokemon, visit the forums  [http://s4.zetaboards.com/Pokemon_Tabletop/forum/3848682/]  or use my tools  [http://ptu.panda-games.net]  #Useful Attributes#  HitPoints, HitPoints_max
